other_title: ベルゼブブ嬢のお気に召すまま。 (Japanese)
plot: Mullin lands his dream job with the demon king he's always held in awe, but when his tenure begins, it turns out the demon king isn't quite what he expected. Beelzebub is a hardworking female demon but her dedication to her job is only rivaled by her love for everything fluffy. (from manga)
ending_theme: "Akuma de Koiwazurai" (Stubbornly Lovesick) by Saori Ōnishi, Misaki Kuno, & Ai Kakuma.
